indian-ocean.name: Indian Ocean
indian-ocean.description: Luxury diving with pristine reefs and abundant marine life

maldives.name: Maldives
maldives.description: Iconic atolls, manta rays, whale sharks, and luxury liveaboards.

seychelles.name: Seychelles
seychelles.description: Granite islands, coral reefs, and big pelagic encounters.

mauritius.description: Wrecks, coral gardens, and year-round warm water diving.

sri-lanka.name: Sri Lanka
sri-lanka.description: Wrecks, blue whales, and vibrant reefs off the teardrop island.

madagascar.name: Madagascar
madagascar.description: Remote reefs, whale sharks, and unique marine biodiversity.

chagos.description: Pristine, protected atolls with limited access and untouched reefs.

cocos-islands.description: Remote Australian territory with clear water and healthy reefs.

christmas-island.description: Steep drop-offs, whale sharks, and unique red crab migrations.
